title: Inside Kim Kardashian's super glam birthday
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Kim Kardashian has given her followers an insight into her lavish birthday celebrations as she turns 39.

She hosted a birthday dinner which wished guests "happy Kim day", and treated her friends to free clothes from her shapewear line.

The celebrations began with her make up mogul sister Kylie , 22, applying Kim's makeup for the day.

They then headed to a dinner at mum Kris Jenner 's house (even though Kris wasn't actually there because she was at Jennifer Lawrence 's wedding).

The table was extravagantly decorated with party hats, rosettes, necklaces, confetti and balloons, while gold lettering spelt out "Happy Kim Day".

Kim's party hat said "birthday princess" and was next to a necklace that said "birthday babe" and a broach that said "today is all about you".

(Image: Kim Kardashian/ Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

She also revealed her guests played Cards Against Humanity - a game where the players all try to choose the most outrageous and naughty cards.

And when you're as rich as Kim, you don't just receive presents.

She also took the opportunity to give her friends gifts, treating them all to clothes from her shapewear line.

Kim posted videos on Instagram of her excited friends opening up bags of the clothes along with free shoes from her husband Kanye West 's fashion collection.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

And she joined Kylie for a lounge by the pool, posting videos of her feet poking out as she enjoyed some time in the sun.

Kylie also posted bikini photos of her and her friend Yris Palmer posing by the pool.

But the other Kardashians appeared to be missing from the birthday celebrations.

Kylie captioned a photo of her and her friend: "Girls trip".

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Kourtney replied: "Where's the rest of us?"

The fans have been loving Kourt's response, with one sympathising: "@kourtneykardash ikr how bout me?"

Another invited Kourtney to a party at their house to rival Kylie's girl trip, while another posted a crying emoji and lamented: "We weren't invited sis."
description: Kim K has been celebrating her birthday with a dinner party - and she treated her friends to gift bags from her shapewear line
